Blocus mode is a browser extension that helps you to block distracting websites and feeds. It is designed to help you focus on your work by blocking the websites that you find distracting.
If you really need to finish something, you can always get some last minutes of access with the last minute button and entering a justification.

# Features
- Block websites matching a pattern and replacing it with a quote
- Block feeds of Youtube, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and Tiktok
- Blocking can be activated :
    - On a schedule 
    - In some locations
    - When the time allowed is over
    - any combination of the above
- Last minute button to get 5 minutes of access with a justification
- Track the time spent per websites
